title.rendered: IPL 2024 Opening Ceremony: Akshay Kumar and Tiger Shroff give an electric performance

content.rendered:
The opening ceremony of the IPL 2024 will take place on Friday evening at the Chepauk Stadium in Chennai. And it looks like the star-studded opening ceremony will be the talk of the town, with stars like Akshay Kumar, Tiger Shroff, AR Rahman and Sonu Nigam lined up to perform. The first match will see Chennai Super Kings and Royal Challengers Bangalore. Due to the opening ceremony, the drawing has been postponed from 7:00 p.m. IST to 7:30 p.m., with the first innings starting at 8:00 p.m. IST. The opening ceremony of IPL 2024 will take place at 6:30 p.m. IST.

The opening ceremony of IPL 2024 will see many celebrities and entertainment. A source confirmed to Hindustan Times that AR Rahman and Sonu Nigam will perform in national numbers, apart from Bollywood songs.

Giving an idea of ​​the timing of the opening ceremony, the source said, “The duration of the entire show, including Akshay and Tiger’s performance, will be around 30 minutes. Sonu and Rahman will also present some Bollywood movies together,” adding, “Apart from musical performances, there will also be a never-before-seen AR (augmented reality) technology show which will also be a highlight of the festival. introduction. »

Last year’s IPL opening ceremony saw Rashmika Mandanna, Tamannaah Bhatia and singer Arijit Singh perform at the event.

Read Also: Suryakumar Yadav will miss the initial matches of the IPL 2024
